page.title: 15HOME
page.content: We carried a random sample survey to find out how many domestic and electrical appliances are in use in the village. Sample was 1 in 6. We decided tO omit washing machines.refrigerators and vacuum cleaners as most people have them. ______________________________________ {AGA COOKERS 8% {COMPUTERS 26% {DISH WASHERS 34% {FREEZERS 88% {HI-FI EQUIPMENT 60% {MICROWAVE OVENS 18% {VIDEOS 20% {CARS 88% {BOATS 6% {CARAVANS 6% { Being a commuter village we were not surprised at the number of cars found in the survey.
